Package de.thowl.automomousinstantdocumentsystem.control

Class Latex

java.lang.Object
de.thowl.automomousinstantdocumentsystem.control.Latex
public class Latex extends Object
This class is a Representation of a LaTeX-document.

It contains methods for the creation of LaTeX-Documents

Version:
0.1.2
Author:
Jonas Schwind
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Latex

      public Latex()
      Constructor for objects of this class

  • Method Details

    • gatherSnippets

      public void gatherSnippets(String type, int chapters, boolean randomise)
      This Method gathers snipptes for a LaTex document
      Parameters:
      type - The "type" of snippets that should be collected, the type is defined by a directoryname in the confighome.
      chapters - amount of snippets
      randomise - should the order be randomised (always true except for tests)

    • concat

      public void concat(String type)
      This method concatenates a sourcefile from snippets gathered by the gatherSnippets method.

      The method gatherSnippets(String, int, boolean) needs to be called first, as it gathers all snippets that are required for the sourcefile.

      Parameters:
      type - type of the document, the sourcefile gets saved under this name at a temporary location.

    • compile

      public void compile(String type, String destination)
      Compiles a LaTeX document from a sourcefile

      The method concat(String) needs to be called first, as it generates the sourcefile.

      Parameters:
      type - type of the the sourcefile ()
      destination - outputlocation for the compilde document.

    • generate

      public void generate(String type, String destination, int amount, int chapters, boolean shuffle)
      This Method is wrapper function, genererate documents here
      Parameters:
      type - type of the document that should be genearated
      destination - directory in which the documunt should be saved
      amount - amount of instances that should be saved
      chapters - amount of snippets per document
      shuffle - generate each document with a new set of snippets

    • getHeader

      public LatexSnippet getHeader()
      Return the header of the document
      Returns:
      the header of the document

    • getSnippets

      public List<LatexSnippet> getSnippets()
      Return the snippets in the document
      Returns:
      a list of LaTeX snippets
